function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid conversion of public venues into healthcare facilities","Impact":"Inadequate facilities may lead to improper isolation and care, increasing the risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough assessment and planning prior to conversion, ensure adequate medical resources and staffing","Technologies":"Healthcare facility design tools, simulation software for capacity planning","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, local governments, facility managers"},{"Description":"Adaptive design strategies for public venues","Impact":"Ineffective or insufficient adaptation may result in suboptimal healthcare infrastructure for future emergencies","Mitigation":"Develop standardized design guidelines, involve healthcare experts in design process","Technologies":"Design modeling and simulation software, modular construction techniques","People":"Architects, healthcare professionals, emergency response teams","Owner":"Architecture firms, healthcare institutions, emergency management agencies"}]}
